org.manathome.totask2.model

Interface WorkEntryRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<WorkEntry,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<WorkEntry,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<WorkEntry,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<WorkEntry,Long>

    public interface WorkEntryRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<WorkEntry,Long>
    data access layer for work entries.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<WorkEntry> findForTask(long taskId)
      find all done work an a task.
      List<WorkEntry> findForUserAndDay(long userId, Date at)
      find all tasks for the given project and day.
      List<WorkEntry> findForUserAndTimespan(long userId, Date from, Date until)
      find all tasks for the given project duration.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository

    • Method Detail

      • findForTask

        @Query(value="select we from WorkEntry we where we.task.id = :taskId order by we.id desc")
List<WorkEntry> findForTask(@Param(value="taskId")
                                                                                                                        long taskId)
        find all done work an a task.

      • findForUserAndDay

        @Query(value="select we from WorkEntry we where we.user.id = :userId and we.at = :at order by we.task.id asc, we.id desc")
List<WorkEntry> findForUserAndDay(@Param(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                                              long userId,
                                                                                                                                                              @Param(value="at")
                                                                                                                                                              Date at)
        find all tasks for the given project and day.

      • findForUserAndTimespan

        @Query(value="select we from WorkEntry we where we.user.id = :userId and we.at >= :from and we.at <= :until order by we.task.id asc, we.at asc")
List<WorkEntry> findForUserAndTimespan(@Param(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                                                                         long userId,
                                                                                                                                                                                         @Param(value="from")
                                                                                                                                                                                         Date from,
                                                                                                                                                                                         @Param(value="until")
                                                                                                                                                                                         Date until)
        find all tasks for the given project duration.
